keyword: how many calories in one starburst
title: How Many Calories in One Starburst?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in one Starburst, plus carbs, sugars, fat, and other nutrition facts per piece with quick tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories in One Starburst?
assumptions: Standard fruit chew flavor, one piece (~4 g), no wrappers or packaging included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, and exact size. Check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One Starburst chew contains about 16 calories, primarily from sugars.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Sour Starburst (slightly higher acidity but similar calories)
FaveRED variety (cherry flavor, minor sugar variation)
Wrapped in chocolate (if applicable, adds fat)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Starburst chew?

faqs.a: Yes, one piece has about 3 g of sugars with 4 g total carbs.

faqs.q: Do Starbursts have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No, they contain 0 g protein and 0 g fat per piece.

faqs.q: How many Starbursts in a full pack?
faqs.a: A standard pack has 8 pieces, totaling about 128 calories.

faqs.q: Does flavor affect calories in Starburst?
faqs.a: Minimal variation; most flavors are around 16 kcal per piece.
